feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:44 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:07 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:44 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 12:44 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 12:44 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
